pr_title: Update to latest Conscrypt release and add workarounds for bugs

timeline.bodyText: Which bug is this? Is there an github issue or similar that could be linked to?
timeline.author: ejona86

replies.bodyText: @ejona86 I added links to the bugs as comments.
replies.author: normanmaurer

timeline.message:
Update to latest Conscrypt release and add workarounds for bugs

Motivation:

We are far behind with the version of Conscrypt we are using during testing. We should ensure we use the latest.

Modifications:

- Update conscrypt dependency
- Ensure we use conscrypt provider in tests
- Add workarounds for conscrypt bugs in testsuite

Result:

Use latest Conscrypt release
